articles.description: By the end of the week, thousands of teens will be eligible for the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine. On Monday, the Food and Drug Administration approved the emergency use of that vaccine for kids as young as 12. But still, Oregon and Washington will wait for Centers…

articles.title: UK teen died on school trip after teachers allegedly refused her pleas for a doctor - Fox News
articles.description: A 17-year-old British girl died from sepsis during a school trip to the Big Apple — after her “history fanatic” teachers allegedly ignored her pleas to see a doctor and disrupt the trip.
